text: 152 is a whole number. It comes after 151 and before 153. It is an even number because it can be divided by 2. == In Mathematics == Factors: The factors of 152 include 1, 2, 4, 8, 19, 38, 76, and 152. Multiplication: 152 = 8 ร 19. Harshad number: A Harshad number is a number that can be divided by the sum of its digits. 1 + 5 + 2 = 8, and 152 รท 8 = 19, so 152 is a Harshad number in base 10. == Related pages == 153 (number) 150 (number) Category:Integers
title: 152 (number)
